summary: A small lore friendly mod that I think adds to the overall immersion of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys, this is my first mod so don't judge too harshly.Â 
When I had the Idea for this mod, I was looking through some of The Elder Scrolls lore, and what I found changed my view of the badass Khajiit. I Always thought that there was only one type of Khajiit, and that there were just different colors. But what I found was that there were a ton of unmentioned subspecies of Khajiit! I thought it sucked that Bethesda or any other modder hasn't done this, (save for the Cathay-Raht in Moonpath to Elsweyr, along with the Pahmar) so I decided to start up the Creation Kit, and try my hand at modding! I couldn't add all of the subspecies, but I have added quite a few. Once I know more about modding, I'll add the other ones to it. My main problem was with the Ohmes and the Pahmar. Thanks so much for your support!
The races I added:
First off, I changed the original Khajiit to the Suthay. So the races other than the Suthay are:

Suthay-Raht

Cathay

Cathay-Raht

Dagi

Dagi-Raht

Tojay

Mane

Senche

Warning, there is a bit of a problem with the Senche. For some reason you can only use the default options. I'll fix it eventually, don't worry.
Thanks again for supporting my mod! And for those coming from my Sans and Chara NPC from Gmod, thanks for waiting for this mod. I had to learn a ton of stuff to be able to do this. I had absolutely NO experience making my own mod for Skyrim. Pls leik & Subscrib.

The mod is also available on the Steam Workshop.
author: Omocron
